summary: Round Shield with the banner of the Saxonian electorate county, that later became indipendent Kindom
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][center][/center][/b][/size][center][b][color=#00ff00][u][size=6]Kursächsisches Rundschild
[/size][/u][size=4](Electorate Saxonian Round Shield)[/size]

[size=4]Round Shield with the banner of the Saxonian Electorate County,
and the crossed red swords of the Earls of Meissen. 
Later, the electorate became indipendent kingdom in the heart of europe with this emblem.
(actually by the French General Napoleon Bonaparte´s gratitude)
The Earls of Meißen ruled that cute little piece of land for over 800 years
(from founding settlements in the 11th century to 1918, end of WWI).[/size]

[size=4]This is a mod, i made for myself (since i live there and thought thats unique), just for fun. The shield is awaiting you at the SleepingGiant Inn in Riverwood at the bar; you can not miss it. This mod only adds a shield. no bugs. no conflicts. enjoy ;-)[/size][/color]
[/b]
The Font used on the texture is "Leipzig Fracture" - immersive as it can get for a Saxonian shield ;-)

[img]http://i68.tinypic.com/20z39yh.jpg[/img]

 [img]http://i66.tinypic.com/1zp1kdc.jpg[/img]
